title: Writing the Matrix
text: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have: $$x+y+z=4$$, $$2x+3z-y=8$$, $$x+y-z=3$$
speech: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have:  x plus y plus z, is equal to 4 ,  2 x, plus 3 z minus y is equal to, 8 ,  x, plus y minus z is equal to 3
pacedSpeech: Each row corresponds to an equation, and the fourth column is separated by the equal sign. We have:   x plus y plus z, is equal to 4
,   2 x, plus 3 z minus y is equal to, 8
,   x, plus y minus z is equal to 3
